response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that I believe would greatly enhance your endeavors and add significant value to your business. The product is valued at $1,500,000 to me, reflecting its unique features, high-quality craftsmanship, and the potential it holds for your future success. Given its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending this offer to you at a price of $1,200,000.

This special offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and strategic acumen in identifying valuable assets. I am confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations, providing substantial returns on your capital. Should you choose to accept this offer, I assure you of a seamless transaction process and exceptional customer service throughout.

Please let me know if you require any further information or clarification about the product or the terms of this offer. I look forward to the possibility of working together and contributing to your continued success.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
